summary: REQ-5 (change Dashboard manual check-in button label to exactly “CHECK IN”) appears to be implemented, but the Dashboard.tsx diff is truncated before the relevant JSX is shown. The diff also indicates additional Dashboard session-flow behavior changes beyond the requested label update.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to daily session flow logic on Dashboard (centralized flow controller, auto-start guard, repeat check-in manual trigger behavior).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists as non-goals: do not change check-in flow logic or modal behavior; only update the button label text.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Dashboard.tsx description: "resilient centralized daily session flow controller...", "only auto-starts...", "REPEAT_CHECKIN requiring manual trigger via \"CHECK IN\" button")

hallucinated_features.description: Removal of the 14-day drinks chart display from the Dashboard.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside scope of changing the CTA button label text only.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (Dashboard.tsx description: "now without the 14-day drinks chart display")
